entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
